title: TMZ: Met Gala, Coachella Moloch, MGK Megan Fox Blood, Die Antwoord, Chappelle, DaBaby & Mike Tyson!
cleaned_text:
On today’s episode of the Conspiracy Theories and Unpopular Culture podcast we get a heavy dose of celebrity-occult symbolism with our TMZ Illuminate Confirm show! We’re going to hit on all of these topics: Ghislaine Maxwell, Mike Tyson on hunting humans, Die Antwoord allegedly abusing their child, Dave Chappelle getting attacked (as well as some VERY strange symbolism from his attacker’s social media…), DaBaby’s troubles, Met Gala symbolism for 2022, Kim Kardashian’s Voodoo of Marilyn Monroe, performances in an Egyptian temple, Moloch at Coachella and Machine Gun Kelly & Megan Fox drinking each other’s blood! You really have to see some of these images I’ll be discussing, do it here on IG at Instagram.com/IsaacWeishaupt
• The Hunt Film Analysis was in August 2020 (*relevant to the Mike Tyson hunting human section): https://illuminatiwatcher.com/the-hunt-film-analysis-cia-in-hollywood-animal-farm-and-the-liberal-conservative-dance/
• Go ad-free with bonus content! 3 options- 1. Patreon.com/IlluminatiWatcher, 2. VIP Section https://illuminatiwatcher.com/members-section/ 3. Rokfin https://www.rokfin.com/creator/isaac (*now with 4K HD video versions of the show). Compare all three: https://illuminatiwatcher.com/members-section/
• Peep all the images discussed on the show at Instagram.com/IsaacWeishaupt
• ALIENS, UFOS AND THE OCCULT BOOK SERIES NOW UP ON AMAZON AND AUDIBLE!: https://amzn.to/3j3UtZz
• Get your mega soft podcast t-shirts (the 2020 ‘Nerds are gonna kill us’ version) AND your signed paperbacks of ALIENS, UFOS & THE OCCULT USE YOUR ILLUSION bundles: https://gumroad.com/isaacw

Support the show: 1. SUBSCRIBE! 2. Leave a review! 3. Go commercial free with bonus content by supporting the show on any of the three platforms!

LISTEN TO THE SHOW HERE:

Listen to the show on the iTunes or Stitcher feeds (**and don’t forget to leave your reviews there as well!!**); or right here on the embed:

Today’s show is brought to you by my books on Audible! If you want to support the show search for “Isaac Weishaupt” on Audible or hit this link to get my most popular book- THE DARK PATH!

3. Go commercial free with bonus content by getting in the VIP Section!

Thanks again for all your support! If you want to stay connected please sign up for my free email newsletter which will get you updates on all groundbreaking revelations of occultism in entertainment (as well as occasional free giveaways)!

Website publisher of IlluminatiWatcher.com and top 5% Amazon author of THE DARK PATH; Isaac Weishaupt has been on the leading edge of conspiracy theories surrounding the elusive “Illuminati” and its infiltration of the entertainment industry. Using examples of familiar pop culture and works of entertainment, Isaac has been speaking and writing about the occult from a unique perspective that seeks to understand the big agenda while helping others along the way.

Isaac hosts the “Conspiracy Theories and Unpopular Culture” podcast (supported by the premium feeds on VIP Section, Rokfin, and IW Patreons) and “Breaking Social Norms.” He has been a featured guest on Tin Foil Hat podcast, Ground Zero with Clyde Lewis, Chris Jericho’s “Talk is Jericho” podcast, “Those Conspiracy Guys,” Dave Navarro’s “Dark Matter Radio,” Richard C. Hoagland’s “Other Side of Midnight”, SIRIUS/XM’s The All Out Show, The HigherSide Chats, BLACKOUT Radio, Freeman Fly’s “The Free Zone”, Mark Devlin’s “Good Vibrations”, VICE, COMPLEX magazine, Esquire, The Atlantic and many more radio shows and podcasts. His fresh perspective and openly admitted imperfections promotes the rational approach to exploring these taboo subjects and conspiracy theories.

Follow Isaac on Instagram: @IsaacWeishaupt, Twitter: @IlluminatiEyes, Facebook: @IlluminatiWatcher, or sign up for the free email newsletter!

*Note that this is pretty accurate- not 100% though. It’s run through software that is generally very accurate and then I give it a quick once over but there are most likely some errors.

**A PDF copy of the transcript is available for Patreon supporters- check out the options by getting in the VIP Section!

And I talked to the lady not even putting this all together at the time. And I said, Hey, I don’t know what happened. I caught the thing in January and I just never snapped out of it. I just don’t feel good. And she’s like, oh, yeah, like we’ve seen a ton of people relapse right after they get the thing. They end up in here to get a booster. Because in ketamine, so in ketamine therapy, it’s long story short, it’s it heals pathways in the brain, if you got like depression and anxiety, you know, all that stuff. I’m not advocating for it. It helped me but you know, I’m also very skeptical of a lot of things. Very strange experience, and I’m going to talk about that on an episode. I don’t know if that’ll probably be breaking social norms. That’s more for that show. Anyway, that’s my theory. I think maybe this this virus is a Zombie Apocalypse Virus. A lot of people were connecting the Will Smith I Am Legend thing to it, which maybe explains why he lost his mind. The slap Chris Rock people are losing their minds everywhere. What if this is the beginning of the end that we just slowly devolve into like crazy. Vampire people or something? Like I said, terrifying theory. I have nothing to base that on besides observation. I hope I’m incredibly wrong with that. And that’s all have a great day. That’s all I got. I know what a way to end the show, right? What’s a better way to end the show? What can I sell you? Let me plug some stuff, you know, go to the Gumroad stored and you get the shirts. While you’re there. Get your little Johnny Depp PDF ebook. It’s not available as a real book. As you know, it’s like 50 pages or something. Mostly pictures. You could also make sure to check out the Instagram post you gotta follow me on Instagram at Isaac wise hop. Link is in the show notes or you can go to all my links.com backslash Isaac W that has links to everything, all my socials and everything, even Spotify, where you can get the Boehner jams playlist, so great. You can check out those these posts and these images on my Instagram. You won’t regret it liking subscribers. I got lots of stuff. I always post on there. I do Instagram Live sometimes you’re gonna love it. It’s great. Okay, folks, thanks for listening. Until next time, stay well.
